channel.title: Pk Legends l Brand new server! l Join Now
channel.description:
Hey! It's Nick, I'm the Owner on PKlegends. PKlegends is a new Rsps server that has done alot of revamping over the past few days. So let's get into it. [http://pklegends.weebly.com] [Pictures] https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23581;image https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23583;image https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23585;image https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23587;image https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23589
[Content] Bossing includes: |Godwars|Nodmad|AvatarOfDestruction|KingBlackDragon|TormentedDemons| CorpalBeast| God Sword: All Specs are working. Special Attacks: Some items may not work, We have noticed the DarkBows Spec does not work. XP: Increased 50x ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Skilling: All skills are active, But all skills are now maxed at 125. [Note]There is a bit of an issue with Magic at the moment. We are doing everything we can to fix this. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Rares: Since this is a Custom server, Well We have over 1,000 Custom items. [Party Hats] |Rune|Lava|Lime|Bronze|Iron|Steel|Mithril|Adamant|Random|Diamond|Red|Blue|Purple| [H'ween Masks] Yellow|Orange|White|Pink|Black|Cyan(Winter)|Lime|Barrows|Red|Blue|Green| [Santa Hat] Bronze|Iron|Steel|Black|White|Mithril|Adamant|Rune|Red|Blue|Lava|Lime| [Wings] Rainbow(Fairy Like)|Lime,Black,Pink,White(Normal)|Lime,Blue,White,Yellow,Black(Death Wing/Cape)| [Weapons] Brutal Whip, This is three whips in one|Halo Sword|StarLight, A sword with a White glow|Masume, It's amazing| Hexa GodSword, Do i need to explain?|Sword Of Ages|Oblitary Sword, Pink outline of Masume|Dominion Sword|Dominion CrossBow|Dildo| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Others [FunPK] Where you can have fights with your friends, without losing anything. [Penguins] Want to try your luck at getting amazing Armor? All you have to do is kill the penguins, get crystal keys and use it on the chest in between the two bankers. [PKChampions] Beating these guys will give you some Nex armor if you're lucky. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Shops 2v2t7ag.png You can get Donation Points, By donating to the server. i58yzr.png You can get Advertisement Points, By spreading the word of our server. fy0h2b.png You can get Npc Points for every Npc you kill. 30wqk4y.png You can get Pk Points By killing other players. no654w.png You can get Reward points by helping with the server. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Bugged Items: Yes sadly some items arn't working at the moment, so please do not use your points/gold on them. Items include. You can still buy these items at your own risk. Some have been modified. Slayer Helm[Does not fit on your head, Or moves around on the players head] Dark Bow[Spec not working] Chaotic Long Sword[Does not fit in your hand, Is also a 2h Sword now, because stats have been increased] We are working on fixing the problems. So please, Don't spam us with. "It's not working right". I'm sure we know already. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ PK legends Server commands ::Sit Gives you a cool little chair ::Donate ::pkp Shows your pk points ::Changepassword [New password here] ::Register [Forums not active yet] ::Help Brings you to the help zone ::Nomad Takes you to the boss nomad ::Asknick Takes you to a room to ask the owner questions when online ::Mithdrags Takes you to Mammoths ::Thieving Level up your thieving skill ::Skilling A custom zone for skilling ::Rarezone You might get lucky and get a rare ::Dicingzone To the dice games ::Dung Levels up your Dung Skill ::Offers Tells you how much Donating can get you ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Ranks [Owner]Nick [Co-Owner] N/A [Head-Admin] N/A [Admin] N/A [Head-Mod] N/A [Mod] Kasey [Temp-Mod] N/A [Helper] N/A ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Pk Legends l Brand new server! l Join Now

item.description:
@system wrote:

Yeah, 1000 customs, the other day God told me RSPS was owned by Jagex

Read full topic
item.source: Pk Legends l Brand new server! l Join Now

item.title: Pk Legends l Brand new server! l Join Now
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_Pk_Legends Owner Of Pk Legends
item.description:
@Owner_Of_Pk_Legends wrote:

Hey! It’s Nick, I’m the Owner on PKlegends. PKlegends is a new Rsps server that has done alot of revamping over the past few days. So let’s get into it. [http://pklegends.weebly.com]
[Pictures]
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23581;image
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23583;image
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23585;image
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23587;image
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=664955.0;attach=23589

[Content]
Bossing includes: |Godwars|Nodmad|AvatarOfDestruction|KingBlackDragon|TormentedDemons|
CorpalBeast|
God Sword: All Specs are working.
Special Attacks: Some items may not work, We have noticed the DarkBows Spec does not work.
XP: Increased 50x

Skilling: All skills are active, But all skills are now maxed at 125. [Note]There is a bit of an issue with Magic at the moment. We are doing everything we can to fix this.

Rares: Since this is a Custom server, Well We have over 1,000 Custom items.
[Party Hats] |Rune|Lava|Lime|Bronze|Iron|Steel|Mithril|Adamant|Random|Diamond|Red|Blue|Purple|
[H’ween Masks] Yellow|Orange|White|Pink|Black|Cyan(Winter)|Lime|Barrows|Red|Blue|Green|
[Santa Hat] Bronze|Iron|Steel|Black|White|Mithril|Adamant|Rune|Red|Blue|Lava|Lime|
[Wings] Rainbow(Fairy Like)|Lime,Black,Pink,White(Normal)|Lime,Blue,White,Yellow,Black(Death Wing/Cape)|
[Weapons] Brutal Whip, This is three whips in one|Halo Sword|StarLight, A sword with a White glow|Masume, It’s amazing| Hexa GodSword, Do i need to explain?|Sword Of Ages|Oblitary Sword, Pink outline of Masume|Dominion Sword|Dominion CrossBow|Dildo|

Others
[FunPK] Where you can have fights with your friends, without losing anything.
[Penguins] Want to try your luck at getting amazing Armor? All you have to do is kill the penguins, get crystal keys and use it on the chest in between the two bankers.
[PKChampions] Beating these guys will give you some Nex armor if you’re lucky.

Shops
2v2t7ag.png
You can get Donation Points, By donating to the server.
i58yzr.png
You can get Advertisement Points, By spreading the word of our server.
fy0h2b.png
You can get Npc Points for every Npc you kill.
30wqk4y.png
You can get Pk Points By killing other players.
no654w.png
You can get Reward points by helping with the server.

Bugged Items: Yes sadly some items arn’t working at the moment, so please do not use your points/gold on them. Items include. You can still buy these items at your own risk. Some have been modified.
Slayer Helm[Does not fit on your head, Or moves around on the players head]
Dark Bow[Spec not working]
Chaotic Long Sword[Does not fit in your hand, Is also a 2h Sword now, because stats have been increased]
We are working on fixing the problems. So please, Don’t spam us with. “It’s not working right”. I’m sure we know already.

PK legends Server commands
::Sit Gives you a cool little chair
::Donate
::pkp Shows your pk points
::Changepassword [New password here]
::Register [Forums not active yet]
::Help Brings you to the help zone
::Nomad Takes you to the boss nomad
::Asknick Takes you to a room to ask the owner questions when online
::Mithdrags Takes you to Mammoths
::Thieving Level up your thieving skill
::Skilling A custom zone for skilling
::Rarezone You might get lucky and get a rare
::Dicingzone To the dice games
::Dung Levels up your Dung Skill
::Offers Tells you how much Donating can get you

Ranks
[Owner]Nick
[Co-Owner] N/A
[Head-Admin] N/A
[Admin] N/A
[Head-Mod] N/A
[Mod] Kasey
[Temp-Mod] N/A
[Helper] N/A

Read full topic
